title: Expert Education & Certifications
description: Liliya holds certifications in SQF, PCQI, and HACCP, placing her among the top food safety professionals.

title: Comprehensive Program Development
description: Liliya specializes in developing and implementing GMP, HACCP, and vendor approval programs, ensuring full compliance with industry standards.

title: Audit & Compliance Support
description: Liliya assists with food safety audits, traceability, labeling accuracy, and regulatory compliance, helping clients meet USDA, FDA, and ODA requirements.
